overview:
MECHANICAL SEED DRILL (cereals-colza)TRANSPORT WIDTH 2.55 - 3.10 m
S MARIA сеялка  - идеальный выбор для минимально обработанной почвы: наконечник и рама иключительно прочные, высокий клиренс и расположение наконечников позволяют работать на почве с большим количеством растительный остатков. На SC можно одновременно разбрасывать удобрение и семена.
std: Mechanical seed drill with plastic dosing rollers for small and large seeds
Cam gearbox in oil bath for seed version
Double cam gearbox in oil bath for seed fertilizer version
Warning boards (disassembled) only on mounted versions
All models are produced with HILL version seed hopper for sowing on steep sloping ground.
Kit pull hitch S (supplied separately) for standard seed covering harrow version
Kit pull hitch SC (supplied separately) for standard seed covering harrow version
Kit pull hitch S (supplied separately) for straight teeth seed covering harrow version
Kit pull hitch SC (supplied separately) for straight teeth seed covering harrow version
Eradicator for mounted version machine (4 items)
External scraper kit for double disc
